page.title: 19LIFE IN BINGHAM (4)
page.content: "What I do not like about Bingham is the bottle bank - people climb on top of the containers and take the bottles and smash them." "There are lots of pubs but why can't they have children's rooms?" "I don't like the rubbish that is littered about Bingham. It spoils Bingham." "Sometimes Bingham can be boring when you naven't got any money to go swimming or to go the Leisure Centre. Apart from that Bingham is okay." "I don't like the main roads." { { It seems that pollution of any sort {really upsets and worries the children {of Bingham, whether it be noise, fumes {or litter.
